ingredients: 1 package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Chicken or Knorr® Fiesta Sides™ - Spanish Rice
1 Tbsp. I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread
1 can (15 to 19 oz.) black or red kidney beans
1/2 cup shredded Monterey Jack or cheddar cheese (about 2 oz.)
1 to 2  tsp. chopped chipotle peppers in adobo sauce OR 1 tsp. chipotle chili powder
